member.name: M:App.Metrics.Health.ProcessHealthCheckBuilderExtensions.AddProcessPhysicalMemoryCheck(App.Metrics.Health.IHealthCheckBuilder,System.String,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a health check on the process confirming that the current amount of physical memory is below the threshold.
member.param: The health check healthCheckBuilder where the health check is registered.
The name of the health check.
The physical memory threshold in bytes.
Return a degraded status instead of unhealthy on error.

member.name: M:App.Metrics.Health.ProcessHealthCheckBuilderExtensions.AddProcessPrivateMemorySizeCheck(App.Metrics.Health.IHealthCheckBuilder,System.String,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a health check on the process confirming that the current amount of private memory is below the threshold.
member.param: The health check healthCheckBuilder where the health check is registered.
The name of the health check.
The private memory threshold in bytes.
Return a degraded status instead of unhealthy on error.

member.name: M:App.Metrics.Health.ProcessHealthCheckBuilderExtensions.AddProcessVirtualMemorySizeCheck(App.Metrics.Health.IHealthCheckBuilder,System.String,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a health check on the process confirming that the current amount of virtual memory is below the threshold.
member.param: The health check healthCheckBuilder where the health check is registered.
The name of the health check.
The virtual memory threshold in bytes.
Return a degraded status instead of unhealthy on error.

member.name: M:App.Metrics.Health.ProcessHealthCheckBuilderExtensions.HealthCheckResultOnError(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a failure (degraded or unhealthy) status response.
member.param: If true, create a degraded status response. Otherwise create an unhealthy status response. (default: false)
